loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access the admin panel.
registerDescription: Create a new admin account with the secret code.
userProfileDescription: Manage your account details. (Read-only for Lite version)
passMarkDescription: This value (50) is used system-wide for determining Pass/Fail status in grades and reports.
themeDescription: Dark mode can be toggled using the sun/moon icon in the application header.
notificationsDescription: Email notifications for system events are planned for a future version and are not currently available.
advancedFeaturesDescription: Advanced features like data export to PDF/Excel for all report types, detailed report configurations, and communication system settings (e.g., SMS/email notifications) are planned for future versions of Report-Manager Lite. The current "Export as CSV" options provide basic data extraction.
noPermissionSystemSettings: You do not have permission to change system settings.
systemDefaultsDescription: Set system-wide default values and school information.
languageSettingsDescription: Choose your preferred display language for the application.
platformGoalEN: A smart education platform for managing student grades, attendance, and communication with parents — making the teacher’s work easier and more effective.
platformGoalRW: Urubuga rw’ikoranabuhanga rufasha mu gucunga amanota y’abanyeshuri, imyitwarire, no gutumanaho n’ababyeyi — koroshya akazi k’umwarimu.
platformGoalFR: Une plateforme intelligente pour gérer les notes, la présence des élèves et communiquer avec les parents — facilitant le travail des enseignants.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Record and store student grades efficiently.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Send grades and updates to parents (via SMS/Email in future).
featureAttendanceBehaviorDesc: Monitor student behavior and track attendance.
featureTeacherStudentReportsDesc: Generate detailed teacher and student reports.
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Store photos or important student documents.
featureCommunicationDesc: Facilitate communication between teachers and school leadership.
